document.full_text: german chancellor angela merkel is hesitating to back the nomination of italy's mario draghi as the next president of the european central bank because she wants several demands met in return, a magazine said on sunday.
document.title: merkel hesitates in backing draghi for ecb: report
lines_and_colors: german chancellor angela merkel is hesitating to back the nomination of italy's mario draghi as the next president of the european central bank because she wants several demands met in return, a magazine said on sunday.
